extracted_playbook.title: Check Current Version of Benchmark Programming Tool
extracted_playbook.description: Verify the installed version of the Benchmark Programming Tool to determine if it is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Benchmark Programming Tool Version 1.2.72
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install version 1.2.72 from the Miele website to close the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Adjust Write Permissions of Installation Folder
extracted_playbook.description: Modify the write permissions of the installation folder C:\Miele_Service\Miele Benchmark Programming Tool to allow file exchanges only with administrative permissions.
